text.autoconfig.imblocker.title: IMBlocker Config
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.screenW: Listed screens would enable your IME
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.recover: Here lists all recorded Screens for whitelist editing.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.command: The method of setting English state when typing command

If your input method can't auto-switch to English state when typing command,
set this option to DISABLE_IM may help,
but note that you can only type English in this mode.
text.autoconfig.imblocker.option.enableC:
[!]Attention: only consider enabling it when your input method encounters compatibility issues.
It will disable most features such as command detection.
